rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Genetic sequencing will help trace the virus’s spread, says Meghan Davis at Johns Hopkins University in Maryland, but this [Genetic sequencing] will take time.
